name: dotapp
body:
A collection of OS X application bundle wrappers.

### Usage

**Recommended**:

1. Install [Homebrew Cask][]
2. Tap [homebrew-dotapp[]

[homebrew cask]: http://caskroom.io
[homebrew-dotapp]: https://github.com/dotapp/homebrew-dotapp

**Manual**:

1. Pick a dotapp from [the list](https://github.com/dotapp)
2. Clone into your `/Applications` directory

### Contributors

* @tlvince

### See also

* [Fluid](http://fluidapp.com/)
